definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: place of confinement, goal, prison; late, guard, watch, observance;—abs. ´[[מ]]: Ge 42:17 +; cstr. [[מִשְׁמַר]] Ge 40:3 +; sf. [[מִשְׁמָרוֹ]] Ne 7:3, etc.; pl. sf. [[רָיו]]- Ne 13:14;—

goal, prison, [[בֵּית שַׂר הַטַּבָּחִים]] ´[[מ]]: Ge 40:3, cf. v:Ge 13:4 (abs.), v:Ge 13:7, Ge 41:10, Ge 42:17 (abs.), + v:Ge 42:30 (LXX), [[בֵּית מִשְׁמַרְכֶם]] v:Ge 42:19 (all E); guard-house in camp Le 24:12 (H), Nu 15:34 (P).

guard, Je 51:12, Ne 4:3, Ne 4:16, ´[[אַנְשֵׁי הַמּ]]: v:Ne 4:17; guard-post Ne 7:3; fig. of ´[[י]]: setting a guard, ´[[כִּי תָשִׂים עָלַימ]]: Job 7:12; band of  (Levit.) guards or functionaries 1Ch 26:16, Ne 12:24 (cf. [[מִשְׁמֶרֶת]]); act of guarding, ´[[מִכָּל־מ]]: Pr 4:23 above all guarding watch thy heart.—´[[לְמ]]: Ez Eze 38:7 is doubtful, Hi Co Toy al. reserve; Krae [[לְמשֵׁל]].
pl. observances, services, of temple Ne 13:14.
